1.1.name: wordpress/ultimate-gallery
1.1.description:
Extremely quickly to use, add the url of videos and that's it all. Thumbnails are created automatically. You can add multiple galleries in the same wp. Support for mobile devices.

Live DEMO and plugin page.

Key Features:

  • Video gallery to play youtube videos or flv files.
  • Width, height, round and border of the plugin are configurable.
  • A list of video thumbnails with paging. You can change the number of thumbnails per page.
  • Player size and size of thumbnails configurable.
  • Title and description for each video.
  • Thumbnail image configurable or automatic.
  • Different designs thumbnails.
  • Load youtube videos on mobiles like android or apple.
  • Autoplay configurable.
  • Dynamic management and very simple to create and manage multiple video galleries in one website.
  • The plugin install
